name: Voices From Beyond
description:
Voices from Beyond is a visual novel that talks about different topics related to death. It speaks about the grief the people who lost someone feel, it talks about the guilt someone might feel about the passing of another person and the regrets one might have after passing away.

Credits: 

Character Sprites: Elina

UI Design & Item Displayables: Ruminio

Backgrounds: mekhfamph & House of Imagi Studio

Written By: Pale Author

Designed By: Nyarus

Music By: Vinneythe18th

Programmer: EndlessMidnightMoon
